attributes.action: Create legislation to prevent privitisation of NHS and Public Health Services
attributes.additional_details:
The NHS and Public Health Sevices are the Pillars, if not the Foundation, of our society. In which any UK Resident may crucially obtain the help they seek.

To deny anyone vital help within our society because of money is inhuman and immoral.

Our principal values should transcend profit and greed.
attributes.background: Create definitive legislation that prevents any privitisation of the NHS and Public Health Services. So that they may be safeguarded indefinitely.
